Madam Chair, Nevada Democrats and Republicans worked together to  implement the Affordable Care Act, including the expansion of Medicaid.  We reduced the uninsured rate by a third, and 563,000 children were  able to receive coverage as a result. The fact that Nevada did the  right thing then means we have more to lose as Republicans…

Ms. McBRIDE. Mr. Speaker, I rise in opposition to this big, ugly  bill. Let's be clear: This bill is TrumpCare. And TrumpCare means 17  million more Americans will be uninsured and all the rest of us will be  paying higher costs and driving further to get care.
